technical defects.option_text: How many accidents were caused by technical defects

misconduct involved total.option_text: Total number of accidents that happened because of a misconduct of one or more of the participants

misconduct Trucks.option_text: Accidents that happened because of a misconduct by a truck driver

misconduct cars.option_text: Accidents that happened because of a misconduct by a car driver

misconduct motorbikes.option_text: Accidents that happened because of a misconduct by a motorbike driver

misconduct bikes.option_text: Accidents that happened because of a misconduct by a cyclist

misconduct pedestrians.option_text: Accidents that happened because of a misconduct by a pedestrian

driver misconduct total.option_text: Total number of accidents that happened because of a misconduct by the driver of a Vehicle

speed.option_text: Number of accidents that happened because the driving speed wasn't adjusted to the road conditions/limits

distance.option_text: Number of accidents that happened because the distance to the car infront was insuficient

right of way.option_text: Number of accidents that happened because the right of way rules where not followed

turning.option_text: Accidents that were related to turning, reversing, etc.

car driver misconduct.option_text: Same as "driver misconduct total" but only for cars instead of all vehicles.

car alcohol.option_text: Same as "alcohol" but only for cars instead of all vehicles.

car speed.option_text: Same as "speed" but only for cars instead of all vehicles.

car distance.option_text: Same as "distance" but only for cars instead of all vehicles.

car right of way.option_text: Same as "right of way" but only for cars instead of all vehicles.

car turning.option_text: Same as "turning" but only for cars instead of all vehicles.
